sections.description:
Get started with Digitalsignagepress Lite and have beautiful digital signage in under 10 minutes, connect your code like Calendar, Weather, Time, Twitter and YouTube to take it to the next level.
Display the morning announcements, advertise your lunch specials, and make sure everyone knows about the after work get together.

With Digitalsignagepress Plugin you empower people to learn about your business, explore your exhibition, discover your products or simply be entertained.
And interactive digital signage empowers you to create memorable and compelling experiences that help strengthen customer interest, increase brand loyalty and quantify preferences.

Digitalsignagepress Enterprise Agency Edition
This plugin is the lite version of the Digitalsignagepress Pro plugin that comes with all the signage features you will ever need including SMIL video support, Videowall function, Multiuser management, Custom Templates, and tons more.
* Click here to purchase the digital signage plugin now!

Digitalsignagepress Lite Features:

  • Screen management
  • Own pictures in slides
  • Text in different fonts, sizes and colors in slides
  • Automatic live updates of screens
  • Digital Signage Dashboard
  • Layout templates are included
  • Included Digital Signage WP Theme

Drag & Drop

We were tired of the bloated and buggy digital signage plugins. That’s why we built Digitalsignagepress to allow you to create digital signage screens in minutes. By using our Plugin, you can easy add text, youtube videos, images and basically create a complete signs in 10 minutes or less.

Pre-built Layout Templates

Building signs in WordPress can be time consuming. Why?

Because every other WordPress digital signage plugin requires you to build your signs from scratch. The truth is, it is often not necessary to create a sign completely from scratch unless you really want to.

Give Digitalsignagepress a try.

Want to unlock more features? Upgrade to our Pro version.

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Upload DigitalsignagepressLite.zip
  3. Activate Digitalsignagepress Lite from your Plugins page.
  4. Choose Digitalsignagepress Theme from your Themes page.
  5. That’s all! Your wordpress is now ready for Digital Signage! You can start to create your own Digital Signage Content with Digitalsignagepress Lite.
sections.faq:
What is Digital Signage?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_signage

I see “Parse error: syntax error, unexpected ‘)’, expecting :: (T_PAAMAYIM_NEKUDOTAYIM)” error message, how do I fix this?

You need PHP version 5.5 or higher on your Server!

How do I change file upload limit?

Edit POST_MAX_SIZE and UPLOAD_MAX_FILESIZE in your php.ini

Live Preview does not seem to work, how do I fix this?

Deactivate all Cache plugins in your WordPress installation!

More Questions?

Contact us! Or read our FAQ on https://digitalsignagepress.com/faq/
